name: Kangarooms Noosa Everglades
description:
KangaROOMs Noosa Everglades is 30 minutes from Noosaville on the banks of Lake Cootharaba in the Cooloola National Park.  

We are called Kangarooms because the cabins are surrounded by Wild Kangaroos making for a truly unique experience! 

We are located next to a holiday park which includes an on-site bistro, bar and micro-brewery so no need to leave if you don't want to cook!  Due to our license, we are not a BYO property but hop into our CootharaBAR and hang out in our beer garden while enjoying a micro brew or house-made cocktail! 

Daily return shuttle services are available to Noosaville and Noosa Junction in order to take advantage of the world class beaches, national park and shopping.  We pick up and drop off at the Greyhound stop, located at Noosa Junction Station - Platform 2 and also Mary street in Noosaville. 

**Shuttle Times Below: ****

This new Schedule commences from 03 Mar 2025 onwards. 

*FROM NOOSA TO KANGAROOMS*
Noosa Junction Station (Platform 2) to Kangarooms: DEP 10:20
Noosa Junction Station (Platform 2) to Kangarooms: DEP 14.15
Noosa Junction Station (Platform 2) to Kangarooms: DEP 16.30
Noosa Junction Station (Platform 2) to Kangarooms: DEP 18.30

27 Mary Street - Noosaville to Kangarooms: DEP 10:30
27 Mary Street - Noosaville to Kangarooms: DEP 14:25
27 Mary Street - Noosaville to Kangarooms: DEP 16:40
27 Mary Street - Noosaville to Kangarooms: DEP 18:40

*FROM KANGAROOMS TO NOOSA*

Kangarooms to Noosa Junction Bus Terminal: DEP 06.40 - ARR 07.20
Kangarooms to Noosa Junction Bus Terminal: DEP 09.10 - ARR 09.50
Kangarooms to Noosa Junction Bus Terminal: DEP 12.10 - ARR 12.50
Kangarooms to Noosa Junction Bus Terminal: DEP 13.10 - ARR 13.50
Note: All services from Kangarooms to Noosa Junction Station will stop at 30 Mary St in Noosaville where you can choose to hop off. 

*We offer a variety of activities!  Of course, guests are encouraged to join our Everglades Explorer or Serenity Afternoon Tours, otherwise you can hire a canoe, SUP, kayak, wave ski or tinnie, discover the lake, Everglades or Noosa River systems. Test your skills on the new Frisbee Golf course or put on your hiking boots and try one of the many walking trails (ranging from 1-22km)-the choice is yours!

Hang out and connect with fellow travellers in our social hub. Share stories, play games, and plan your next adventure together.

With abundant wildlife all around, you are guaranteed to spot kangaroos, witness the swagger of our monitor lizards, see the cheeky antics of our Curlews and Kookaburras and you could be lucky enough to have a visit from an echidna.

houseRules.notes:
Cancellation policy: 
Before 2pm the day before arrival a full refund will be permitted. 

No-Show 
In case of a no-show, no refunds permitted. 

Guests are required to show photo identification and credit card upon check-in. 
All special requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.  
Guests under 18 years of age are not permitted to stay.
No late check-ins permitted. All guests must arrive during check-in hours. 

Check-in from 14:00 to 21:00.
Check out before 10:00.

Taxes included.

Public spaces / Noise curfew is from 10pm to 6am

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
